channel.title: Negative Oil Pries on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Negative Oil Pries on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 5
item.description: The last two weeks have been abysmal, my internet connection went back on mid-week and I haven’t spent much time doing anything other than working. I barely managed to find something worth sharing but here we are, still showing up. [video] Negative Oil Prices Explained.: One of the most interesting things I have seen recently. A comprehensive explaination of how derivatives work, the factors that caused oil prices (for a single contract) to become negative recently, what does it mean for the oil industry and why you will never get paid for refueling your car.
